## Simple Linear Model 
```{r}
library(broom)
library(dplyr)
library(here)
data_path <- here("dataset", "rent_income.csv")
library(readr)
rent_data <- read_csv(data_path,show_col_types = FALSE) 
model <- lm(RENTGRS ~ INCTOT, data = rent_data)
model_tidy <- tidy(model)
print(model_tidy)
model_augmented <- augment(model)
print(model_augmented)
model_glance <- glance(model)
print(model_glance)
```
